item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 16th May
item.description:
Customer has reported a leak coming up through the road. Water and clay are leaking up through and the road is always wet. This has been investigated by STW (10/05 - 13994350) there was no chlorine detected and advised this is a highways issue. There is a meter round section where the tarmac has worn away and may be some sublevel issues from this water.
Report on FixMyStreet
